newsitem.title: HONG KONG: Allied Bank closes US$50 mln FRCD.
newsitem.headline: Allied Bank closes US$50 mln FRCD.

text.p: Allied Banking Corp has allocated its US$50 million floating rate certificate of deposit issue, arranger Standard Chartered Bank said on Tuesday.
The three-year notes were launched at par to float at 85 basis points over the three-month London Interbank Offered Rate. With fees, the all-in return is 91 basis points to top-tier managers.
Arrangers and lead manager Standard Chartered Bank committed to US$8 million.
Co-arrangers and lead managers Bank Austria Aktiengesellschaft and Korea First Bank committed to US$6 million each.
Co-lead managers Bangkok Bank Public Co Manila Branch, Daiwa Securities (HK) Ltd, First Chicago Hong Kong and PT Bank Negara Indonesia (Persero) Singapore Branch committed to US$5 million each.

Managers AFC Merchant Bank and First Commercial Bank Singapore Branch committed to US$3 million each, and managers Banque Nationale de Paris Manila Offshore Branch and Landesbank Rheinland-Pfalz Girozentrale committed to US$2 million each.
Signing is set for November 8, 1996 and the deposit date is on November 15, 1996. -- Hong Kong Newsroom (852) 2843-6371
